timeline.message: leaked scopes that revert to null are unloadable

timeline.bodyText:
Doesn't block this PR at all, just to record my thought and maybe @felixbarny has some ideas too.
I haven't worked with unloading scenarios much but wonder whether this is so odd - since most things get cleaned up when GC happens, it seems natural to me for unloaded classes to also wait until GC to be cleaned up.
